title: 12 moments that defined the first 12 F1 races of 2025
summary: From dramatic races to shocking plot twists and standout performances, these are the 12 pivotal moments that shaped the opening half the 2025 Formula 1 season

qa_pairs.question: What is a common factor in defining pivotal moments in Formula 1 races?
